name: Virtual exhibition - Surfing without the Frills
name_original: Virtual exhibition - Surfing without the Frills
description:
This is a virtual exhibition of the documentary 'Surfing without the Frills'. This was mainly developed as a proof of concept for a fast, custom built, high fidelity virtual gallery space using Unreal Engine 5. 

Download both files (split zipped) , Unzip and use the exe file to play.  WASD for moving and your mouse for looking around. Sorry no HUD or menu atm. 

Sketchfab 3D Asset Credits :
